content: आभासः [भास्-अच्] {@--1@} Splendour, light, lustre. {@--2@} A reflection; तत्राज्ञानं धिया नश्येदाभासात्तु घटः स्फुरेत् <ls>Vedānta</ls>. {@--3@} ({%a%}) Resemblance, likeness; <ab>oft.</ab> at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>; नभश्च रुधिराभासं <ls>Rām.</ls> &c.; चिदाभास, ({%b%}) Semblance, phantom; युक्तिवाक्यतदाभाससमाश्रयाः S.B.; तत्साहसाभासं <ls>Māl. 2</ls> looks like wantonness. {@--4@} Any unreal or fallacious appearance (as in हेत्वाभास); पुनरुक्तवदाभासः <ls>S. D.</ls> {@--5@} A fallacy, fallacious reasoning, semblance of a reason, an erroneous but plausible argument; see हेत्वाभास; <ls>S. D. 270.</ls> {@--6@} An intention, purpose.
